import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{getUserRole}from"../util/auth";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faArrowLeft,faArrowRight}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import"../css/categorylist.css";// Importez votre fichier CSS pour les styles personnalisés
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CategoryList(_ref){let{category}=_ref;const userRole=getUserRole();const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);const containerRef=useRef(null);const handleNext=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex+1)%category.length);};const handlePrevious=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prevIndex=>(prevIndex-1+category.length)%category.length);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{textDecoration:'underline'},children:"Categories List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-scroll",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"scroll-button",onClick:handlePrevious,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowLeft})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-list",ref:containerRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:category[currentIndex].name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"data:image/png;base64,".concat(category[currentIndex].image),alt:category[currentIndex].name}),userRole==='Admin'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/editcategory/".concat(category[currentIndex].id),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/deletecategory/".concat(category[currentIndex].id),className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Delete"})]})]},category[currentIndex].id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"scroll-button",onClick:handleNext,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowRight})})]})]});}export default CategoryList;
